Description: Great food, great service!
Name: Danielle D.

Description: Nice place and good service
Name: Inna A.

Description: The service was excellent and food great.
Name: Roxane W.

Description: Food is great and the staff is very nice!
Name: Amy G.

Description: Fun service.  Wine tasting was very good.  Dinner was good.
Name: Steve H.

Description: The food was good and the staff was friendly. It was a nice atmosphere. My biggest qualm is when I reflected, my waitress charged us approximately 35% in gratuity. While I never have a problem paying gratuity, it was not communicated that that would be automatically added to our bill. Additionally, I believe standard gratuity is between 18-22%. 35% is excessive and I feel taken advantage of.
Name: Cadacia T.

Description: The ambience was nice and the staff were very attentive and friendly. My complaint is that on the Groupon itself it doesnt tell you that you'll be charged gratuity based OFF OF THE PRE-DISCOUNTED value, until AFTER you purchase the Groupon and there's a subsection under the redemption code. The food was eh. For the total spent, I'd go to a hibachi next time. Wine was budget wine, good to cook with
Name: Ted M.

Description: The food is decent, the wine is of the cheap variety. Writing this to say: as an establishment if you are going to run a Groupon deal to "enjoy" your experience, it would be appropriate not to treat guests using it like less-than-customers. You're literally running this deal because you need the business...but the employees don't act like it. Very dismissive. Seems like they don't prioritize people who use the deal, which by the sounds of it from table to table, is the main reason people are there. Further, I don't like people touching my phone. I don't know who hurt the waiter but he is insistent on touching your phone and hitting the groupon voucher himself. Maybe don't treat people you've invited to your establishment via Groupon like they're trying to get one over on you? The whole experience was stiff.
Name: Kerissa K.

Description: Me and my boyfriend had a wonderful experience ..the staff was very helpful kind and welcoming..i couldnt pull up my groupon voucher but the staff were kind enough to allow me to charge my phone and provided a charger ..great food and i was able to take a bottle of wine home ...other couples sitting next to us were very nice as well ...im def going to go back ....awesome deal
Name: Lakeia T.

Description: 2 drinks and bottle of wine pretty good , dinner was really really small , lucky I had a big lunch . Anything like potatoes, rice, etc was a lot extra. Without groupon would have been over a hundred without tip . Bottom line ok with Groupon , no way without lol
Name: Michael E.

Description: The food was good. However beware, there is a sneaky tip the owner tries to include at the end. Be sure to pull out your calculator and do the math. The tip was 40% (yes 40%!!) of the $50 Groupon price. He charged a $20 tip on the $50 Groupon.
Name: Krystal B.

Description: At first I was skeptical because  I saw a review on how they were charged $40 as a tip after they paid but I didn't have that happen to me. This was fun, the wine was good, the food was good, the waiter was nice. Overall I'd say it was great we even got two bottles instead of just one to take home which was nice. Def will be back with some friends.
Name: Valarie A.

Description: Decent wine. Deceiving in that we had to pay the suggested gratuity which is ridiculous and should‚Äôve been clearer on the groupon.
Name: Hollie H.

Description: Great intimate experience! Went here on a date night with my husband and we love the service!!!  Wine tasting was very nice, food was good, the restaurant was very clean. For desert we had the cannoli-Yummy!!!!!  What makes this place so amazing was the service! I have already asked my husband if we can go back.
Name: Niki N.

Description:
Food was amazing, Wines were great, service was impeccable. Will definitely go back!
Best Groupon offer ever!!
Name: Wendy

Description: The brunch at 1742 Wine Bar is great! We've been there four times. The food is delicious and the staff is great. We will be going back going for sure!
Name: Brenda G.

Description: Amazing experience great atmosphere,  food, wine and staff was sit down with you friendly.  They went over the top to make sure you had a great experience.
Name: Michelle V.

Description: Very nice experience!  Good food & wine and friendly staff.
Name: Jack V.

Description: Apps were good, entrees were AMAZING, and the wines all tasted great! Such a great deal, especially because you can choose which wine from the ones you tasted that you want to take home. We also ordered the tiramisu, which was probably the best we've ever had. Great experience in a cute part of NY.
Name: Yliana

Description: Waitress was the best..food was excellent! Will come back again...the prices are amazing for the quality
Name: Isamilly M.

Description: Quirky little NY place. Excellent service, good wine and food. Great price. Also one short block to the subway. Check it out!
Name: Marsha M.

Description: Great food, wine, and service.
Name: Trevor C.

Description: Amazing service. Food was exceptional and the wine was soo good! Will return asap!
Name: Elizabeth C.

Description: cozy atmosphere, excellent service, and food was delicious.  will return.
Name: Ann_Mari B.

Description: Not bad at all. Nice cozy atmosphere. Food was great. And the service was excellent. I would go back again.
Name: Joseph K.

Description:
I took a friend as a gift to 1742 Wine Bar. We had a good experience. The food was okay; I thought appetizer/s could have been better and larger portion. 

We would have preferred if we could have selected wines we wished to taste as opposed to wines preselected by wine bar.

Overall, we enjoyed our time at 1742 Wine Bar.

Description: This was our first time there and the service was prompt and very pleasant. Great wines, the food was excellent in a casual NON rushed fashion. Needless to say, we enjoyed it very much. Plus we got to pick a wine from the tasting menu to take with us. We were in from Boston and this will become one of our regular places when we visit NYC.

Description: They charge a mandatory extra $50, and I felt rushed in my time there and the wines were decent.
Name: Rohan P.

Description: It was a great experience. The food and drinks were delicious. The service was very good. I would recommend eating and drinking there.
Name: Rene S.

Description: I've been here 6 times, just did my girlfriend's 13 person birthday brunch and the food is always awesome and the prices are always low low low and the service is always exceptional. And Tony is the man!  I'll be back 6 more times.
Name: Willie M.

Description: I loved everything.  Food was great.  Wine was great. Staff were accommodating and attentive. Can't wait to go back.
Name: Shanelle W.

Description: very good food, very good wine, very good service.  A bit away from everything else as it is in upper 90's - but definitely worth the trip!
Name: Nancy H.

Description: Great food and wine! Nice atmosphere
Name: Humming N.

Description: Great food. Great wine with great portions during the tasting. Place is small so I recommend reservations. I will definitely go back again.
Name: Cecellia B.

Description: Did the wine tasting special. Loved the space, but it was rather noisey. Wines were very tasty and the pours were generous. Yes, because the special was an excellent value. and at the end of the day, there was nothing to really complain about.

Description: food was just good. wine was better and service was the best
Name: Lissette S.

Description: Great time.  Good food. Good wine.  Our waiter was knowledgeable and engaging.    Fun spring day in NYC.  Winebar completed our trip,
Name: Wendy Y.

Description: Great food, wine and waiter!
Name: Yelena S.

Description: Great place to have a intimate date! The staff was friendly and the food was good. And yes the place is small I saw a alot of complaints about that but I had a great experience.
Name: Valerie H.

Description: Excellent wine, food and service !
Name: Linda R.

Description: Great food, wines and service. Would highly recommend the experience.
Name: Allison H.

Description: The Wine Bar is a nice small quaint place enough room for great conversation to be heard by the company your keeping...the food was good when it arrived however,it took all of 50 minutes, drinks where nice but beware that this is a establishment that sets their own gratuity oppose to providing options and choices...
Name: Rosalind P.

Description: Great food and of course the Wine !!
Name: Cheryl E.

Description: Quaint .  Great food , wine and service
Name: Kelly F.

Description: Service was great.  Food was weak.  Had the steak and tilapia.  Steak was very thin but extremely chewy.  The massive amount of sauteed spinach overwhelmed the small cut of beef.  Tilapia looked like a flash frozen filet.  The wine choices were ok, again, not particularly exciting. Mediocre atmosphere with cramped tables. not worth the price.  Another $40 tacked on for gratuity and frzn pie.
Name: Adam K.

Description: Great food and service.
Name: Toni L.

Description: Excellent service and very good food .love it  I will go again!!!
Name: Yeissi A.

Description: Always great service and tasty food!
Name: Rose A.

Description: This place was amazing the service was wonderful and so was the food
Name: Jeffrey D.

Description: Great food and great service!!
Name: David N.

Description: I highly recommend this Groupon. Great food, great wine. Fantastic friendly people.
Name: Lylah L.

Description: Nice food and wine. Services are great
Name: Eliseo B.

Description: Fun dinner pairing with wine. Good food great service and staff and you get to choose a great bottle of wine to take home. This is a win win for sure!
Name: Patricia G.

Description: Great service, and the food and drinks were excellent!!
Name: Erin M.

Description:
BEWARE:This deal seemed like it was too good to be true, and I was right!!! The appetizer consisted of 1 piece of salami, pepperoni, ham and 2 pieces of cheese to split. The pasta meals were decent but small portions. The wine tastings were great and came with a very fair portion. 

HOWEVER, when the bill came after ordering a dessert, we were surprised to see a $30 tab. When we asked the waitress, she told us the 10% gratuity was calculated based on the "estimated value".. which she found to be $180!!! ARE YOU OUT OF YOUR MIND?! 

Not only were we disappointed with that aspect of this groupon, the night we were at the wine bar they were offering the same deal to all customers except they got to take home TWO bottles of wine... 

Feeling very ripped off by this place, I do NOT recommend.
Name: Jules B.

Description: Very friendly and food was great! Will go again!
Name: Lu L.

Description: Food was excellent.  Server was cool and funny. Wine tasting was great. Will return again
Name: Petra A.

Description: Good food , excellent service
Name: William A.

Description: Nice atmosphere.  Nice wine...good time but expensive appetizer.
Name: Lisa F.

Description: Great experience! Food and drinks were good! Staff provided great customer service!
Name: Yazmile F.

Description: Great wine, great food and very freindly service.
Name: Heloisa D.

Description: Such a cute little place! Friendly staff and great atmosphere
Name: Faye A.

Description: Food was absolutely delicious. Nice ambiance.
Name: Denise W.

Description: Amazing! Took my mom here on her visit to NY. Service was excellent. Dinner was exceptional with good portions. Description: It was a great experience!! The food and wine was delicious.
Name: Lakeya

Description: I have come here with a groupon and without and it has never disappointed. The server, the food and the ambience are great!!! Will be coming back soon....
Name: Soti S.

Description: We were seated at a very small table and we thought OH NO but the wine tasting was good. Waitress very friendly and helpful. Our pasta dishes were delicious.
Name: Jeanne V.

Description: Delicious food, comfortable atmosphere, wonderfully attentive service. Well worth the price!
Name: Dawn Z.

Description: Awesome service, amazing food and great atmosphere. I would highly recommend this place!
Name: Maddie T.

Description: Perfect place with delicious food,  great service,  decent selection of wine.  Definitely be back!
Name: Marynochka

Description:
Wine bar is amazing. We were greeted very politely and seated promptly.

We really had the mindset that we might be treated differently since we bought a groupon but instead we were treated the same. 

Will come back!
Name: Lu L.

Description:

Description: fun evening, great steak dish and great pizza. some nice wines too, though I would've loved to see more options. Well, it is a wine bar.
Name: Laura D.

Description: Such great people. Food was amazing and the wine was excellent. Beautiful.
Name: Julie M.

Description:
This is the best groupon in NYC and possibly the world!
I had the steak and spinach and my friend had the pizza.  The food is great and the service is great!!!
Name: Bob L.

Description: Very cute little place, the food was good! The staff and service was wonderful. They had a nice sampling of wine.
Name: Michele S.

Description: It was great. Service was great and just the entire experience was great. Went there before and going again.
Name: Mikhail M.

Description: Worth the money and excellent service. Be prepared to pay a tip for the total value of the dinner, which is very acceptable.
Name: Wayne M.

Description: Good service,good food small table. Friendly atmosph
Name: Tamara G.

Description: Great food, wine, service, and neighborhood vibe!
Name: Jane S.

Description: Great experience ! Best pizza and amazing smooth white wine. Cocktail drinks were kind of weak but overall the staff was welcoming and the atmosphere was chill. Would go back again for the wine tasting !
Name: Yanni

Description: The food is great, the wine was awesome. Would definitely recommend the Wine bar.
Name: Mark S.

Description:
kind service
great wine and food
i look forward to returning

jane
Name: Jane K.

Description: I‚Äôve been there before and enjoyed it, but i don‚Äôt think the food was as good as the last time. Service very good and accimmodating.
Name: Doris B.

Description: Great value, and fun wine tasting! Yummy entrees. A enjoyable dinner.
Name: Barbara

Description: Good food and wine. We had a nice time, waiter was knowledgeable, etc. The reason for my lower review is that this deal is immensely misleading. I live two blocks from this restaurant and they advertise this "deal" literally every day. It's the standard cost of this meal at their restaurant. But then they sell it as a $175 value on Groupon, and expect you to tip on that value rather than the actual cost. So this left us with a sour taste in our mouths. Nothing against the restaurant, just how they're using Groupon to make extra money in tips.
Name: Sean D.

Description: very private setting.  Wait staff was great.  The food and wine were awesome.
Name: Matt L.

Description: Great food‚Äî- lovely waiter !
Name: Valentia D.

Description: Great service excellent food and wine. A excellent date spot brunch ot dinner. Would recommend to all and any especially wine lovers great selection.
Name: Leon W.

Description: Great service and free bottle of wine and great food and drinks.
Name: Richard M.

Description: The food was good I received it almost 45 mins after ,service wasn‚Äôt so great. They need to hire more people to help the over crowded place also was giving incorrect information about the wines . Overall wasn‚Äôt what I expected . Wouldn‚Äôt go again .
Name: Envy G.

Description: The restaurant was nice and the food was really good but I just wish the wine was better like sweet. They only had dry wines but it was a good dinner
Name: Natashia C.

Description: Nice place, good service, food was ok. A little overpriced for what was on the menu
Name: Roxanne

Description: Our server was superb and the food and wine were all delicious.  We would like to return to your restaurant again!!!
Name: WIlliam F.

Description: I loved it here, great service and every chill. Will def come back!!
Name: Shante B.

Description: Great dinner and date spot. The food was great, the restaurant was bustling with activity and we tasted some good wines. I would 100% recommend this Groupon and restaurant to a friend and hope to be back soon.
Name: Brian M.

Description: Had a great time. Fun experience. Thinking about bringing my sister and a few friends for their birthday. The food was good.
Name: Marlene B.

Description: Food was delicious. Voucher easily helped with the customer service. Making everything fast and easy.
Name: Melly M.

Description: Staff are very kind and accomodating, food is outstanding
Name: Donna C.

Description: The place is small. We had a 7pm reservation on a Sunday and we were placed at a table on time, which was good. We were placed in the back room which was nicely lighted. Name: Sha-Vonda B.

Description: Went with my Sister, food and wine were excellent! We had a great time.  Service was amazing, highly recommend going here for the wine tasting dinner. Definately going back.
Name: Melanie R.

Description: Great place to relax and unwind. Service and food were great as well!
Name: Hector P.

Description: Really great. Such delicious food and great personal service
Name: Katherine A.

Description:
Everything at wine bar is great. The wine, the food specially California pizza and skirt steak.

Description: This is a nice neighborhood place that we plan to return to.  The Groupon was a good value, which got us in the door, but we will return because we enjoyed the food and drink and the regular menu prices are reasonable.

Description: One of the best restaurants and best service I have been to. Amazing!!!

Description: Beautiful setting and great service. Just know the tip will be 15% of the value not the groupon price. Ended up 25$ with tax but well worth it.
Name: Kathleen

Description: Cute little place.  Good service.  And great value certainly get a bang for the bucks
Name: Nathan B.

Description: Great service and value!! We will return.
Name: Anita S.

Description: The service was decent. Nothing especial about this place or deal.
Name: Orlando B.

Description: They poured generously for a 6 glass wine tasting and offered a choice of entrees and and standard appetizer.  The environment was fun and we got to know our table neighbors. Description: Fun place! Good food, great wine expert.  Had fun, the whole back room talking to each other.

Description: Not what we expected but the staff were very attentive & the food was good. What more could we ask?

Name: Philip W.

Description: This spot is the place to be...the food is great and the Staff is excellent ü§óü§ó
Name: Victoria J.

Description: Cute cozy place for a candlelight dinner! Friendly service & great deal minus the ‚Äúyou can‚Äôt pay with card‚Äù when given the receipt. I thought we should‚Äôve been notified earlier. Other than that, the night was enjoyable!
Name: Katherine D.

Description: great food & great wine
Name: Adam C.

Description: Very great! The staff was so friendly especially leo. The place is small but cozy and the food is amazing. I will definitely go back !
Name: StarrQueena D.

Description: I wasn't sure if there was a catch to this Groupon, but there really wasn't! Service was great and restaurant delivered. Awesome G-pon and savings.

Description: ALL EXCELLENT  FOOD AND SERVICE GREAT
Name: Robert G.

Description: Great service, wines were delicious!

Description: Good food and good environment
Name: Carlos A.

Description: Really good food, great deal
Name: Nancy C.

Description: Very good service and very friendly staff I love the service

Description: Nice place.great food.
Name: Marianne V.

Description: Really cute place and the service was fantastic. The bartender/server did a great job tending to all the tables and guests and was genuinely kind and helpful.
Name: Jerica L.

Description: Good deal, informative staff
Name: M. S.

Description: It‚Äôs a nice small and cozy place on the upper east side. It‚Äôs a nyc gem. The waiter was informative and the I couldn‚Äôt believe you could actually taste 6 different wines and take a bottle home of your choice. The food was really good as well. I‚Äôm looking forward to trying brunch at this location.
Name: Tracey M.

Description: Great food, great people. Highly recommend it.
Name: Ayoola A.

Description: The general experience, vibe, and location were fine. The food was alright, but nothing that I couldn‚Äôt make myself. It was nice to have a bottle to take home. My biggest complaint/concern is that the wine that was part of the wine tasting seemed to be watered down. Like, exceptionally watered down. I think this deal is good for a quick date night, but not much more than that.

Description: Absolute Wonderful experience!! Amazing food & positive vibes. The entire team was welcoming, professional & accommodating. I look forward to my next visit.
Name: Alicea H.

Description:
Always great service...heavy tasting pours.
Food is average.
Atmosphere is comfortable and chic.
Name: Jennifer S.

Description: Meal was great value, service was great and friendly, bought several more Groupons!  Small portions, but great pours
Name: Byron

Description: Excellent food! The service was great especially Tony!
Name: Lori A.

Description: Pretty good! Great prices on wine. In particular I was impressed with the dry Zinfandel. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this for anyone looking primarily for a culinary experience.
Name: William J.

Description:
The reason I gave this restaurant 3 stars instead of 5 has nothing to do with their service nor food, it has everything to do with their deception of the bill. 

This restaurant is very cute and comfortable with great vibes. Along with great vibes the food is very great. The service provided here was great, our waitress was great..great all around.

However I would beware of the decpetive bill that comes after this great service. At the end of your great evening you get charged taxes and gratuity.

Nowhere on the fine print of this groupon does it say anything about these fees. The gratuity is not 10% 15% or 20% of your groupon it is 10% of the original price!!!! $178.00. How crazy.

& on top of this unexpected bill this place is CASH ONLY with an atm machine of a $3 fee. 

You walked into dinner spending $50 and walked out spending $80....

Not great for a restaurant to deceive its paying customer..

first and last time trying this place out....
Name: Nora

Description:
Great place
Vary good service üëçüèªüåπüç∑
Name: Pnina N.

Description: The staff was great!  I'd definitely buy this again!
Name: Theresa C.

Description: Awesome deal for the money spent.  Food is delicious,  staff is friendly and wine was very good quality.
Name: Sharon

Description:
Good food.
Didnt like 25% gratuity included in check when we didn't see server much, nor needed it.
Name: Orion A.

Description: Very cozy, beautiful ambience. More than enough selections of wine, nice cheese platter and delicious entree‚Äôs!! 10/10 recommend to anyome

Description: I like the ambiance of the place. The food is simple and tasty. The white wine choices are great too. I love the free bottle of wine of your choice. The wines are in season. Nice bread and cheese with olives platter.

Description: Wine was cheap, food was edible but would not recommend. Service was good.

Description: Food was hot, service was ok. Waited about 20 minutes for food.  I purchased this groupon for $29.00 because It seemed like a decent place.  Got check at the end of meal for taxes of $3dollars and tip 9 dollars. Why was the tip 9 dollars?  20% is 6 dollars, she seemed to have set her own tip amount.  That is a turn off, never again.

Description: Great service great wine

Description: Great place and service!!!! Please ask for Eddy. He is the best

Description: The food was delicious and the wine as well

Description: Great food and waiter was very nice.

Description: Like the reviews mentioned, there‚Äôs a gratuity charge but the service was excellent so even tipped on top of it. The food isn‚Äôt anything to write home about but if the idea of a decent meal with a cocktail and half bottle of wine appeals to you then this is definitely the place to go! I hope I can go back next time I‚Äôm in the city!
Name: Kyle N.

Description: Very good service and people
Name: Juan P.

Description: Food is mediocre nothing special, the appetizer plate is very corny, they charge 18% gratuity plus tax which came to $34.00 on top of the $50 Groupon I already paid for so I really wasn‚Äôt getting a deal that Groupon makes you think. Name: Brittany B.

Description: Good food and service. Long wait...
Name: Sead M.

Description: Food was great
Name: Atsuko I.

Description: Food was good. Great value with wine, even with the added gratuity. Cash only.

Description: Staff is excellent and attentive.  My dining mate really enjoyed the steak over salted spinach.  My meal of rigatoni a little salty.  Overall a great deal.

Description: Good food, good drinks. You can get the same deal by just walking in. It‚Äôll run you the same amount.

Description: Good atmosphere and location.  Food was okay, as my diet is limited; and not a huge wine drinker, but selection was good.  Melissa, our server was awesome!  Great place to try.  I will be going back!
Name: Rodney E.

Description: Food was really good and the drinks were worth it. Definitely would come back--but make sure to bring cash!
Name: Isabella M.

Description: Very cute place with attentive, friendly staff! All the wines we had for our tasting were good. We had two pastas which were both really salty. The pizza the table next to us had looked delicious!
Name: Carolyn N.

Description: It was really good. Definitely your money worth. The appetizer was great to start and the entree was really delicious. I got the shrimp pasta and my husband got the chicken kebab and we were both very happy. Giving it 4 stars because while we did get served a lot of wine the wine was average and nothing out of the ordinary. Can't expect so much for the price though. Overall great experience!

Description:
This Groupon is very tempting due to the low price but that's because the food and wine is very lousy. 
The pizza was okay, but the cheese and charcuterie plate was the saddest thing I've ever seen. The whites in the tasting were lukewarm and watery. It sounds like a good value between the app and main and tastings and bottle, but spend $50 on something you'll actually enjoy.
Name: Andrea E.

Description: Waited very little to get seated, the portions were big and great, the cocktails were strong, the atmosphere was very chill and romantic.
Name: Chloe B.

Description: Good food. The problem is they charge you all these random fees so the groupon isn't true
Name: Madison L.

Description: absolutely incredible experience me and my wife enjoyed it very much and will be returning customers due to the great customer service flavor of the food and varieties of different wines to taste from
Name: Victor P.

Description: Loved the food and appreciated that we were provided a spot at the bar even though we didn't book - decided to take a risk and turn up as we were in the area. The voucher came with 2 cocktails. We chose a margarita but were misheard and provided martini's - which is no big deal - it was strong - which is a positive but thought it strange that it didn't come with olives. The person next to us ordered a martini and received one twice the size with olives. We did enjoy ourselves and the food - I would just consider the sizes and quality served should be consistent if you have a voucher or not.
Name: Patricia H.

Description: We enjoyed our dinner. Excellent customer service.
Name: Carlos S.

In looking at the wine on the train ride home I demised the Chardonnay (allegedly from Spain) could have been bought at most liquor stores for under $10.00. Twist off cap. No cork.

Description:
Definitely worst Groupon experience I ever had.
We arrived at the restaurant with an online reservation(by email) and our table wasn't ready. We waited for almost 20minutes standing outside before we got our set.
It is actually a fake value on Groupon($170).
You can buy the experience directly at the restaurant for the same price($49 plus taxes).
If you buy it at the restaurant is also includes one more bottle of wine to take home. While with Groupon you get one bottle.
Food was actually horrible, appetizers very small (2 slices of salami and 2 of cheese) and entrees very bad cooked (over cooked shrimp and broccoli pasta).
The funniest part was when bill came. 
It supposed to be $53 (taxes included) but then we showed our Groupon and he made us to pay $23 more for tips and taxes. So we actually paid taxes on the fake Groupon of $170. When we tried to ask about it but the owner immediately became rude and he told us to leave. He also took back a bottle of wine we were suppose to get.He told us he didn't care about what we thought because he got many good reviews anyway.
I definitely wouldn't recommend this Groupon and this restaurant.

What ruined the night for me is that nobody stated over the phone or online that it was cash only. I brought my credit card. Tax came out to 5$ and Gratuity was 25$ They have the credit cad machine and refuse to take payment less then 20$ The manager was disgusting yelling about his tip i offered a 10$ tip and 5$ for tax and told him to please swipe the credit card. He told me to leave and come back with cash and that we can not take our bottle with us. I then took a picture and stated i would leave a bad review because i live in another borough to do all that traveling is pointless.   Was handed a bill at the end of the dinner for $23 cash only ( they direct you to an ATM in front)  for tax and gratuities. Description: What a great experience! Food isn't out of this world but you cannot beat it for the price. Wine was great. Service was even better. Would absolutely go back again.

Description: I had a very nice time.. the waiter was great, food was awesome definitely going back soon.!

Description: Had Sunday Brunch, food was awesome, atmosphere was fantastic.

You will have to make a reservation and most times you will have to wait for your table because they are so busy but it is totally worth it. The wait usually isn't long at all. We hope to be back very soon! I reccommend this place to everyone, literally! We hope to be back very soon!

Description: A low-key neighborhood place. The ambiance is warm, the service great, the food hardy.

Description: Atmosphere is great, nice food and service however we ordered one additional desert and the bill was higher than expected wasn't sure what other charges were. They also request that you pay cash only if you are a Groupon user.

That is not to say the meal was not good, but just not vodka sauce. Great service and great wine. All in all a great experience! Just expect a milder take on a vodka sauce! Highly recommended groupon.

Description: Brunch food is good and wine selection is pretty good also.

Description:
Lovely and cozy place. Wine was excellent, pasta dish and eggs benedict served nicely plated and hot and delicious. We loved the wines and the tastings were nicely paced. Particularly liked the Italian Riesling.

Having a bottle to go home with was a nice touch. We paid additionally for coffee and shared an ample sized piece of the cr√®me brulee cheesecake and it was totally worth every cent and calorie!

Description: Eddie is the best server in the place. Great food deal and great wine selection. Very pleased with the steak and spinach option. Our appetizer never came but they were happy to remove that from the bill with no problems.

Description: Good value. Steak was tasty and well prepared. 3 whites were good: Pinot Gris, Sauvignon Blanca and rioja Blanca. 3 reds were table wines - light and fruity. The temperanillo and montepucciano were a tad too light for us. We would have preferred a drier, more robust wine with a bit more structure to go with the steak. The last red was an interesting sweeter blend. Downside is cash only, no cc.

Description: It's a cute little Italian spot with very little options for main dishes. The meat and cheese platter was small. It was like 2 types of meat and 2 types of cheese with 2 little pieces of bread. I was with a group of 4 and all of our dishes were great. Our server was really nice and he gave us extra wine. We had 6 glasses in total which kind of had us a little tipsy at the end of the night. Overall it's a good little spot and we got two bottles of wine to take home from the one's we sampled. Using this Groupon they taxed us like $4 and they added a ridiculous amount for gratuity so we ended up paying another $30 extra after buying this Groupon.
Name: Icilyn M.

Description: Great food and service was excellent, friendly owner and very attentive. We will go back often. Sal

Description: Much more than just a tasting!!!! Great food too!! Wonderful ambience as well!!!

Description: Great atmosphere wine was lovely. Would definitely go again.

Description: Food and wine is good. The people are nice. Highly recommend.

Friendly, informative evening

Description: Great as usual

Description: Really really good worth every penny

Description: Food very good.. Wine choices not as good. Very small intimate spot. Drinks from bartender just OK.

Description: The servers were very attentive, the food was delicious, and the portions for the wine tastings were very generous! My boyfriend and I loved this experience.

Description: The food was delicious! The hostess and owner were extremely friendly. Would definitely go back!

Description: The service, the atmosphere, and the food was excellent.   Highly recommend it.

Description: This was a fantastic experience. Description: Food was just okay. Wine was terrible - super cheap and I'm not even a wine snob. :) Service was fine and the ambience was good.

Description: The food is AMAZING, the wine super good, the service very nice. We really had a good time there. Planning to go back soon!

Description: Great wine tasting selection, great atmosphere. Food was good and the hostess was very educational about the wines that they offered. A very good experience I would definitely visit again

Description:
I have written a review before.  The restaurant is great.  There food is fantastic.  The atmosphere is wonderful and, of course, the people who work there are great.  Tony usually waits on me and he is great. I love sitting at the bar.

Sara

Description: Amazing food, service, and a variety of food to select from. Had an amazing time for $29

This was an enjoyable and unique experience.

Description: Great Service, cozy atmosphere, delicious food...
Name: John J.

Description: The food was pretty good. They appetizer need to be more than olives and 2 slices or cheese and 2 slices of meat. I didn't like the fact that they add taxes and tip to the original amount of food. They also only take cash when you use the Groupon.

Description: This was a nice and tucked away restaurant for the upper west side. I liked the wine selection and service. The service was great and atmosphere were pretty good too. The only down side is that it is a little tight, but other than that I thought everything was good for the amount of money you spend. Description:
1st date friends

The food was bland and small in portion.limited wine selection

Description:
I bought the Groupon Deal for a dinner for 4 people. The atmosphere was great, the servers were very friendly. But the food was a no-no. My food( I ordered the Rigatoni broccoli and chicken), as well as my friend (she ordered a pasta dish with shrimp), were EXTREMELY salty, surprised we didn't leave with high blood pressure. The pizza my best friend ordered was good. And my best friend's sister ordered a steak dish and it turned out okay. 
THE BILL- when the bill came, they were nice enough to tip themselves 15% and then some. the tip was $22 alone and they charged me 80 cents for a single candle. PERKS-The deal came with 2 wines and we only had one and we were allowed to take the other one home.

Description: The food was excellent and the staff was great...love it

Description: So I was so excited for this deal, a "charcuterie" plate as appetizer, then entrees for my wife and I.  Plus a tasting of 6 wines.  Unbelievable right?  What a hoax; I hardly call two small pieces of cheese, a couple slices of meat and some poorly toasted crostini's as a charcuterie plate.  Because of this we ordered appetizers (congratulations on getting me to spend more money) then the entree portions were not that great.  Thank goodness we did order appetizers otherwise we would have left hungry.  The wine tasting was very good, and we enjoyed it very much.  However I would love to know the person who quoted the "retail" price of this groupon at $170.  That is a joke.  I'm sorry we will not return and even though the service was good; the hostess was very nice, I didn't appreciate feeling like I was taken advantage of.

Description: First time going to 1742 Wine Bar, The food was amazing. The staff was extra helpful. Love this place . Definitely will be going again and recommend  all my friends  and family to try it out. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Amy

went here for some brunch before the museum. good service and awesome food. would come here again ! 

felt like Italy to me

Description: Food and service were great! My only complaint was that they charged gratuity that came out to $25. I think this was a percentage of what the groupon value was not what i paid for the groupon. I of course was going to tip but it is disappointing when you go some place with a groupon already paid for and then are required to pay an additional amount. Tip is supposed to be based on service, food, and experience. It is not something that is required or guaranteed and if they were going to require it they should have mentioned this in the fine print of my groupon. Something i thought was $50 turned out to be $75. Which is still a good value but again I did not appreciate that I wasn't made aware of the additional charge upon purchasing at which point I would have been able to make the concious decision to pay $75 for the groupon.

Description: This is great for a date night out!  They usually have two package deals here on Groupon....one with dinner and a bottle of wine, and one with dinner a wine tasting and a bottle of wine.  I prefer the one with the wine tasting and dinner because they give you a bottle of wine to bring home after your done and the other package they don't do that.  The wine tasting dinner is also nice because they explain all of the wines to you as your tasting them and then leave you to you intimate dinner.  It's a little tight in there not much room...but always crowded.....because this place is that good!  The food is good and it's definately a great find in the city...I wish I knew about this when I lived in the city...but it's more reason to keep going back!  I love this place!

Service is wonderful!
Food grea

Back again

Description: The only thing decent about this place was the service. The wine along with the food were terrible. The wine tasted spoiled and the food has no flavor. We had ordered the steak over spinach. I couldn‚Äôt even say the experience was worth it. You‚Äôre better off saving your $50.

Description: The wine was good as was the champagne which was served in plastic champagne glasses.  The place is super small, narrow and loud. I had the skewered tomatoes with salad which was pretty good but the rigatoni was extremely salty.  There‚Äôs nothing about this place that would make you want to go back.  The host was friendly and knowledgeable about wine but there was nothing memorable.
Name: Susan R.

Description:
Appitizer was equivalent to a lunchable. Half a slice of ham, salami, pepperoni and cheese. The actual wine experience was great, good selection. The dinners were great also. This brings me to the worst part of the deal. They claim this is a $130 value, which its not and they charge you gratuity on $130 which came out to $20. However they only charged us tax on what we spent on the groupon/deal ($39), tax was 4.95. It's weird to me that they over value the serviece to ensure a tip, but they don't charge tax on that value. There is a sign up front advertising our deal for $49, I wonder if they were charged gratuity on "value" or just the price they paid. Just shady, and it's a shame because with some honesty and good appetizers this would be a great place.
 So even though it was just two of us, we were charged 18% gratuity on the value not the price of the meal, theft! They didn't even disclose on the menu of an 18% gratuity on every bill, typically dining is over 6 people then an 18% charge is applied.
Name: Daniel D.

Description: Staff was great. Food and Wine were excellent. Cozy and intimate environment

Description: This Groupon really is a wonderful deal. All of the food is delicious, the wines they serve are all very different and of very good quality, and the atmosphere was perfect for our Valentine's Day date! Also, even though dessert is not included in the Groupon, definitely order the Tiramisu! It's AMAZING! The service was wonderful as well. Maggie was our waitress, and she was able to chat in depth with us about each wine that she served. My boyfriend and I are really interested in wine, but even if you're not, it's still really cool to get the background info and the story of where the wine you're drinking actually comes from. We had so much fun! Two thumbs up, and we'll definitely be back!

Description: Good location very good food and wine.  Great deal!
Name: Carmela A.

Description: Although very busy and a bit helter skelter, and the fact that the appetizer we received was not what the groupon had described, we had a very good experience at 1742 Wine Bar!  Cute set up with delicious wine and food (skirt steak with spinach and pizza).  Very busy, but service was still helpful as the bartender was rushing around majority of the time.  Would return without Groupon if I was in the area.
Name: Rena A.

Description: Service was excellent. Appetizer was mediocre: entrees were not five star but pretty good. Wines were  varied [as a tasting should be] and the pours were generous. Overall a good value for the Groupon price.
Name: Linda F.

Description:
Had a nice meal.. Tasted some great wine .. Service was great!
Enjoyed our evening ...will return
Name: Ann H.

Description: The overall evening was decent. the food was good and the wines were good. However, the experience was eh. The wine tasting presentation was very scripted and would have been much nicer if the wines were paired and served with foods that complemented the flavors rather than having the wines brought to us at random when the server got the chance. On the plus side, the wait staff was pleasant and attentive and the food was delicious.
Name: Kimberly P.

Description: I recommend this to everyone. If your looking for a place with good food and wine this is the place to go to. The service was great, wine and food was delicious! I read the reviews before I made reservations and a lot of ppl were negative. If u but this groupon I suggest going after 9 pm so that you beat the groupon rush. I definitely will be returning.
Name: Laci M.

Description: A must go to ..... Very nice ambiance and great wine and food
Name: Melissa D.

Description: We waited over 90 minutes despite having a reservation because one of our party was stuck on the train. Make sure your whole group is at the restaurant so that you don't have to wait to be seated. The food was good, well worth the groupon price. I don't think I would go again for their regular prices. The wine was decent, I've had better, but overall a good evening out with friends.
Name: Kathryn M.

Description:
Great place with good ambiance, good wine, food and service.
Only problem is the road construction kind of provides a tainted preview in your mind of what is inside. Even with this, once inside, you will not be disappointed!
Name: George F.

Description: Get there early, don't go in a large group as the place is very small. Enjoy all the great wine.
Name: Dario C.

Description:
The staff was extremely courteous and attentive.
The wine was excellent.
The prices are reasonable.
Name: Darlene W.

Description: The portions were small and at least one other appetizer choice would have been nice. The wine was really good and our attendant was really nice and knowledgable .
Name: Annette D.

Description: Great value,  nice food, lovely wines
Name: Xarbeys

Description: The wait was a bit long because it seemed everyone had reservations at 7 but it was worth the wait.  The staff was incredible.  The woman who served us was really cool (taller, dark hair pretty woman with an accent).  The wine was good, The food was excellent and the tables on either side of us were fun so we turned our romantic anniversary date into a little party.  Except for the lack of parking, i'd go back any time.
Name: Keith C.

Description: thank you for a wonderful experience. The wine and food and ambience were fantastic.
Name: Valerie G.

Description: They need better wine glasses...the need to get white wine and red wine glasses or don't call the place a wine bar... you can have the best wine in the market but if you don't know how to serve it it's a crime
Name: Francesco C.

Description: Great wine, great food, great night!
Name: David C.

Description: Fun little spot for a good meal and wine!
Name: Cristin G.

Description: Great place!  Great wine!
Name: Eneida T.

Description: The service was fast, almost too fast. The waitress was very friendly and knowledgeable but she seemed like she was trying to rush us through dinner because they had other customers to seat and not enough tables. The food was tasty and the wine was good. A very good value with Groupon.
Name: Jason S.

Description: They have really good wine
Name: Bobby

Description: Awesome pizza and wine, and lovely atmosphere!!!
Name: Megan A.

Description: good wine, pleasant experience, food good but not great.
Name: Nancy L.

Description: Great service, great wine + food, great price and atmosphere!! LOVED IT.
Name: Jessica F.

Description: The food and wine were both delicious
Name: Jesse A.

Description: The place is adorable. The staff was friendly and knowledgeable . I couldn't even pick a favorite wine, they were delicious!
Name: Whitney A.

Description: great service, so friendly, wonderful atmosphere, awesome location, excellent pizza & wine, again-- amazing amazing service
Name: Kelsey P.

Description: Great spot for wine tasting and a delicious meal.  Groupon was a hit!  Melissa was knowledgeable & very friendly.  Would definitely recommend 1742 Wine Bar.
Name: Daniele R.

Description: Decent food and drink, but great service and drink portions
Name: Saeun

Description: we waited almost an hour & we had reservations and we was on time. There needs to be more structure on how seating works , but this place was awesome service food decor!! I would definitely go back again.
Name: Aqua L.

Description: The pasta is amazing!
Name: Christiane A.

Description: I am actually mixed about this "deal". You certainly get a lot for your money. The wine flights had generous pours. However, the wines were not that good. The app was not good at all, basically just deli meat. The mains however were good so long as you stay simple.
Name: Fred I.

Description: Overall we had a good experience. But it's a long haul from Jersey to go all the way up to the UES for wines that are typical at best. We were expecting better wines to be honest. Instead the usual suspects were present.
Name: Rich S.

Description: Well the wines were good. The steak had no flavor, burnt on top and rare in the middle. I told the waiter the steak did not taste good and was burned. He argued and insisted that's the way it's suppose to be. It took him several minutes to finally take it back and bring out another tasteless steak. It was horrible. I will never go back again.
Name: Solmari R.

Description: The food was amazing the liquor was strong which was good didn‚Äôt like that they don‚Äôt tell you they charge you $20 in gratuity and it‚Äôs cash only. Not going to return but food again was amazing
Name: Matthew G.

Description: I was pleasantly surprised by my experience at this location. While the place is very small and intimate I will say that I enjoyed the food, the person who serve the drinks, and the choices that we were presented. I was also surprised to see that we were given a bottle to take home which was a nice touch.  You really cannot beat that price for two people to enjoy food and drinks along with token.
Name: Tavannie P.

Description: Good food with okay service. A good deal overall. We recommend it.
Name: Cindi W.

Description: Great shrimp linguini and skirt steak
Name: Stephanie B.

Description: Wine  selections are great! Bartender and waitress way too chatty. Seems like they were more like hanging out then working. As for the food to my dish was to salty and my co-worker dish was bland. I shall only return to have wine and sit at the bar.
Name: Adriane A.

Description: It was nice..good food..nice place..but small portions..overall..it was nice
Name: Christopher V.

Description: Went with my husband and everything was perfect. The food was AMAZING. Service EXCELLENT. Very nice atmosphere. Will definitely be good by back. Thank you.
Name: Jessenia V.

Description: The Samon was fantastic!
Name: Christian C.

Description: Know that they only accept cash. The food was ok. Wait staff was ok. I arrived before my friends and the waiter didnt allow me to sit at a table even though the place was almost empty. I had to wait at a bar until my friend arrived and then we were seated. The place is very dark inside, its not a nice place to sit. The only outside seating are 2 tiny tables too close to each other so zero privacy.
Name: Marie.drapal

Description: This was the worst food I've ever had out in New York City. I've lived here over 30 years. Worst ever meal.  The wine was also really cheap and bad, but far from my biggest issue.The service was good though.
Name: John C.

Description: The waiter's interaction with the tastings adds another level of fun   The chicken was delicious
Name: Phyllis C.

Description: Food was quite good, as was the service.
Name: Herb W.

Description: Food was fantastic!  Still ended up spending $40 with tax and (mandatory) 20% tip.  Oh and they only take cash, so I had to use their ATM which charged me $3, plus my bank charged me $3.  üòä good times.  So "deal", nope, but I'd go back for the food and order off regular menu without Groupon.
Name: Jessicca G.

Description: Food was very good.  Although my friend ordered the Bolognese and it came very salty, they exchanged it for her for the shrimp pasta dish right away no questions asked.  The wine tasting deal was great and we got to pick which one we wanted to take home.  the place is very very tiny and intimate.  sometimes sitting very close to your neighbor.
Name: Barbara K.

Description: Food was great and service was too as well.
Name: Jennifer T.

Description: Awesome food and server.. thanks!
Name: Hector R. M.

Description: Restaurant was excellent me and my girlfriend really enjoyed the place, the service and the food was good, I will be going back again only thing it was a little crowded but other than that it was great place to have a meal with loved one
Name: Kiona B.

Description:
Generous wine tastings
Wonderful service
Name: Richard T.

Description: Really nice atmosphere The service was excellent, our waiter was super nice The wine tastings were a good amount per pour The food was good
Name: Ashley G.

Description: Great place, good food and vine selections
Name: Youri S.

Description: The food was great and they described each wine. It's a cute little whole in the hall for the spot. It's not a large place. Small and intimate.
Name: Lauren M.

Description: The food was absolutely delicious! Im not sure if they were the owners or managers but they were very polite and entertaining. Will definitely be returning.
Name: Melissa C.

Description: You're really coming here for the wine. The food isn't bad, but if that was brought up to par this place would be great. Also requesting the wine tasting deal without the Groupon gets you an extra bottle to take home.
Name: Devin G.

Description: Good time, large wine tastings, so you end up drinking a lot of wine.  However...Bring cash - the tax and tip and whatever else you may want to order is cash only.  Would have been nice to know in advance but they tell you when they bring the check and then tell you there's an ATM around the corner, that part I didn't like
Name: Joann R.

Description: Great food & service is perfect very friendly.. The wine tasting fantastic.
Name: Beatriz V.

Description: Deal is fantastic....3 wine tastings about 4oz ea....choice of entrees fabulous & both we had excellent...+ 1 bottle to take home....app was good also....service great
Name: Tony L.

Description: The Groupon was a good value  Wine tasting was excellent as was the appetizer Main course selection was limited
Name: Jacqueline C.

Description: Everything from the selection of wine to the wait staff and food was amazing I will enjoy another wine tasting at 1742 Wine Bar
Name: Jose R.

Description: Good food and wine tasting but expect the bottle to be to go they don't tell you that in the details of  the Groupon
Name: Jessica G.

Description: The appetizer is a joke: Cured meats and cheeses. My husband and I each got a plate: 2 pcs of cheese, 1 piece of sliced pepperoni, salami and one rolled piece of ham. A green pepper. Plus two small pcs of crunchy Italian bread. My husband has a decent appetite so even though the Chicken Milanese was a decent piece of chicken it only had arugula on top - that's it. Salads or even more bread not included. He got two appetizers at a pub down the block after cause he was hungry still.  So that was disappointing. Really need to know the place before you go. Unfortunately, we don't live in area & it was our 1 year wed anniversary night out. Wine tasting was good. Our waitress gave my husband a little more red x 3 glasses b/c he forgo the white wines
Name: Terri T.

Description: I gave this to a friend and her husband for a NY Christmas trip, they loved it!! They said the food and service was awesome and they really enjoyed the wine tasting.
Name: Andrea L.

Description: Good service, food was good, wine tasting was good, overall definitely worth checking out the wine bar restaurant.
Name: Pablo R.

Description: We thought that the wine tastings were great; the food was only so-so.
Name: Jean O.

Description: Good appetizer and entrees.  Great wine tasting (3 white and 3 red) plus a bottle to take home.
Name: Patricia M.

Description: Great atmosphere, great food--portions somewhat small, but that was okay, the wine tasting was awesome--got a serious buzz and had to stop drinking ( 5 glasses of wine can do this..), and the service was wonderful. We went back for a pf brunch offer this past weekend. Nice time.
Name: Clare C.

Description: The experience was wonderful.  Great dinner and wine tasting was more than expected.  Service staff was wonderful.
Name: Celita

Description: Excellent service, food quite good, and the wine tasting a perfect accompaniment.  Total price for the dinner, including one quite good shared desert was quite reasonable.
Name: Herb W.

Description: I was unsure what to expect with this Groupon and wine bar... there was many mixed reviews and a lot of them were negative. I have to say though that I am so HAPPY we bought and redeemed this promotion! When we walked it this place was PACKED, but we were greeted right away and waited only about 10 minutes for our table. My fiance' and I got a cozy table in the corner and were greeted immediately by the lovely Maggie. She was fantastic, friendly, and accommodating. All our wine tastings were great, food was yummy and we got a bottle to take home. Can't beat that! Thoroughly enjoyed.
Name: Eva C.

Description: The food is not that great or a lot. But the wine tasting is good. If you only like red or white tell them and they will give you all of that kind.
Name: Gillian K.

Description: Keep it to a 2 hour limit or they kick you out... Food was good, wine tasting was great and the bottle of wine a big plus!!
Name: Kristine M.

Description: Reservations a good idea. Went without any  on a Thursday night at 9:00 and luckily were seated quickly. Had a great time. The wine tasting was very nice.
Name: Skip B.

Description: The wine tasting is quite generous!
Name: Mary S.

Description: After reading some of the reviews I got a little nervous but I am so glad I made the purchase.  It is a small establishment but the service was wonderful.  The food was delicious and the wine tasting was good.  I would definitely return
Name: Wendy M.

Description: I really enjoyed the wine tasting as well as the great food.. I would absolutely recommend the groupon deal as it was well worth it!!  Service was great and ambiance was nice for a small setting.. Good choice for an intimate setting..
Name: Kaamilya K.

Description:
The food at this place is DELICIOUS!!!! My husband and I truly enjoy eating there. The wine tasting is good.
One of our favorite pizza is the barbecue chicken. Awesome place.
Name: Alexandra O.

Description: We sat at bar for dinner, which has a charming atmosphere. Wine tasting was enjoyable, and owner was knowledgeable about our wines. Food was absolutely delicious!! Plus, a bottle of wine to take home!! Will definitely return to restaurant.
Name: Sandra A.

Description: The food wasn't anything to brag about. However the male bartender was very knowledgable and created a great experience to someone who knew nothing about wine. The wine tasting was fun and great.
Name: Yesenia C.

Description: The wine tasting was great. The food was good. waitress was terrific. We were seated immediately.
Name: Diane B.

Description: Overall, the experience was positive; service was friendly and positive with the food and wine tasting quite delicious. With that being stated, we were a bit put off that we were told we could not use a credit card "with that deal" even though we made additional purchases beyond the Groupon. It just seemed not very customer friendly nor was there any verbiage stating this policy within the "fine points". It was an aggravating end to an otherwise positive dining experience.
Name: Joe B.

Description: Food and service was great. The wine tastings were also very good and generous.
Name: Vivian R.

Description: Wine tasting was great! Loved our server!
Name: Daynon B.

Description: Keep it up! The wine tasting was great. I love that it happened throughout the meal.
Name: Chris T.

Description: Very busy and small restaurant.  Food was excellent; wine tasting was great.  Tables are close together.  Plan on waiting for your table.  Reservations are needed.  Our waitress was great.
Name: Susan H.

Description: We enjoyed our meal and wine tastings and our server, Eddie, was very pleasant and knowledgeable about wine.
Name: Dorothy L.

Description: The wine tasting was enjoyable and the wines were very nicely chosen.  We enjoyed the food very much, as well.  We'll be back!
Name: Kim S.

Description: Very nice wine tasting
Name: Lisa D.

Description: It was a good deal with good food and a good vibe.   Our server, Melissa, was great and added to our having an enjoyable wine tasting and dinner.
Name: Catherine H.

Description: Thanks for the awesome wine tasting!
Name: Fernando C.

Description: We enjoyed the wine tasting, excellent hostess, and the variety of wines and knowledge we acquired.
Name: Marina K.

Description: The food was delicious and the service excellant!!
Name: Eileen H.

Description: FUN WINE TASTING DECENT FOOD
Name: AJ W.

Description: Great food. The se
Name: Shelby H.

Description: My girlfriend and I have utilized various Groupons to eat and drink here. The bartender and hostess/front of the house manager are two of the most competent professionals I have ever encountered in the restaurant business.  Both as a patron and an employee.   The food is good and more importantly consistent!  Bon gusto!
Name: Frank C.

Description: Great food and drink
Name: Dave F.

Description: Small but food was amazing and drinks were great.
Name: Dawn J.

Description:
Great place with awesome people
Small and cozie 
Tasty food 
Awesome wine collection
Name: Eduardo E.

Description: Wine selection is a plus. Food is pleasant and worth the trip.
Name: Windsor T.

Description: Very small place.  But decent food very good, not too much to choose from, but the food is tasty. and for the price of the Groupon was great. Strong drinks.
Name: Alina C.

Description:
It was nice experience but hidden taxes were surprising. Be ready for it.
Food was nice though.
Name: Sherry D.

Description: Good food....cool spot.
Name: Sharon B.

Description: Excellent customer service and GREAT food
Name: Michelle W.

Description: Really delicious food!
Name: Vizi L.

Description: Melissa was great!! Great food, great fun!! Thank you so much!!
Name: Sandra D.

Description: The food was amazing.  The staff went above and beyond......will for sure go back when I go back to the city.
Name: Duane T.

Description: Highly recommended this place the food is delicious and the costumer service excellent best place to visit in new york!
Name: Mayra E.

Description: This place was super small but the food was delish! The bellini's were definitely a favorite of mine. Brunch menu had your usual options, like frittatas and french toast but also had penne and paninis as well. Nice place to have a casual brunch.
Name: Nohely D.

Description: The food was excellent and wine flowed all night.  Then you got to take a bottle home afterwards.
Name: Denise S.

Description: the food was fantastic an the service was great definatly check this place out
Name: Daisy B.

Description: Great place, great food
Name: Emilie P.

Description: I love this place, the mood, the setting, and the food is awesome! Second time going there with Groupon and won't be my last!
Name: Michael N.

Description: Very services, good food and excelente places
Name: Brunilda R.

Description: This place was awesome and the food was amazing A little small but worth it for a date night!
Name: Jeremy M.

Description: Nice food
Name: Pauline C.

Description: This place was great! Small and intimate setting.  Sampled six wines, and they gave you more than just a taste portion.  Our hostess was Melissa, she was fantastic!  Pleasant as could be.  Even though she was busy, she made time to have good conversation with us, she really made this place a winner!  Oh and the food was excellent, well worth the money!  I would go back without a Groupon, it was that good!
Name: Eric W.

Description: Great food! Friendly workers!
Name: Tamar

Description: Our server Eddie was amazing. Drinks and food were awesome. Definitely worth coming back!
Name: Abram M.

Description: Food is excellent
Name: Steven C.

Description: Margaret is one of the servers - she is fantastic! food is delicious - we had chicken milanese and taco pizza - our friends had the tilapia. it is a fun night out and Margaret isn't cheap with the wine tastings!
Name: Dawn G.

Description: Great food!  Lovely people. Reminded us of a London restaurant
Name: Sandy H.

Description: You will have to pay 15% gratuity and tax when you are done. I was unaware of additional fees but the food was really good.
Name: Tiesha S.

Description: Food was bad wine tasted like rubbing alcohol. Customers around us shared the same experience. Ambiance and service was good
Name: Sharon G.

Description: The service and ambiance were great. The wine selections for both white and red wines was delightful. The shrimp linguini was delicious! My boyfriend and I both ordered it and demolished the whole thing.  We liked the food so much we ordered cheesecake for dessert to split.  We would definitely go back. It is a great date spot!
Name: Rachel B.

Description: The back room we were sat was a secluded room without windows (it has sad blocked ceiling windows) with funny decoration. Food was mediocre. Wine was a supermarket quality wine. But service was very nice.
Name: Dwayne S.

Description: They treat everyone with kindness and professionalism. The hostess/waitress was very informative. I had the stake while my friend had spaghetti... Overall great experience..Definately recommend the wine tasting dinner..
Name: Jaime A.

Description: Staff very nice...great experience...definetly recommend...will return...lots of fun
Name: Jim B.

Description: I had the most AMAZING experience here. The owner waited on us and did not let us down. He was flexible and accommodating with our groupon. We were in New York for two and a half days and this was my, as well as the rest of my group's, favorite part. If we ever go back to NYC it would be because of 1742 Wine Bar! It's a place I would have never chosen while walking past it. It blew my mind!
Name: Alexis S.

Description: Great deal with an even better experience
Name: Eric R.

Description: Omg! Such an amazing experience! I never been to a wine tasting before. This was the perfect treat to myself. This is a MUST VISIT!
Name: Juanita B.

Description: Had dinner there this evening. Very welcoming atmosphere, and dessert is well worth it. Great value and experience. Would recommend to others.
Name: Holly M.

Description: Wonderful experience and money well spent. Christine gave me all the info and I followed her instructions. I've toned down so much and I feel great!
Name: Daura J.

Description: Always have a wonderful experience when I go can't wait to go back
Name: Deneque W.

Description: It was a really nice experience.  I would definitely go back. Space is a little tight.
Name: Arleen R.

Description: Great experience! Well worth the price!
Name: Courtney S.

Description: An enjoyable evening with wine aplenty. The food is just average but the "total" experience is most satisfying
Name: Ronald M.

Description: great experience and romantic. food was ok but wine was great!
Name: Harpinder

Description: It's a very good experience and they are helpful to the novice wine connoisseurs
Name: James R.

Description: This place is great!  The server - Melissa - never made you feel rushed.  The bartender & wine pourer - Eddie - awesome!  And the busboy - James - never let a dirty plate stay on our table.  They were all attentive and we can't wait to share the 1742 Wine Bar with our friends!  Great experience and value!!!!
Name: Geri-Sue J.

Description: Greatvdood and service.  Wonderful experience!
Name: Diane G.

Description: Wonderful experience!!!!!!
Name: Eddie

Description: It was a nice experience. They do not accept cards, cash only.
Name: Yadira C.

Description: Great experience. Try both red and white wines for full experience
Name: Clarence W.

Description: Great experience.  A bit cramped, but I would definitely go again !
Name: Yolanda P.

Description: This was a really cozy spot, our hostess, Margaret, was so friendly and pleasant, and gave us a really good experience! Definitely coming back, and did I mention, the food was delicious!!!
Name: Anastasia V.

Description: Great deal and great experience! Thank you Tony!
Name: Marieme D.

Description: while the waitress was very nice, the appetizer looked like it was pulled from deli meat and cheese from the grocery store across the street. the cheap wine that was served was decent portions and the food tasted edible until we left and felt ill almost immediately. i would not go back here regardless of how cheap the food was offered to me. do not recommend in the slightest.
Name: Samantha P.

Description:
The best kept secret in NYC, the food was amazing Defintely Grade A  the ambiance and decor elegantly displayed, small intimate and highly recommended.
Very attentive staff, and just a great-great experiance everytime.  :) 
A MUST FOR A GOOD MEMORABLE TIME..
Name: Angelo S.

Description: Cute little place. The good is good. Only had a 10 min wait. Staff is pretty courteous as well.
Name: Leah H.

Description: We really got very little food.  We have used many groupons before.  All we got was one bottle of inexpensive wine per couple and one entree each.  We got no appetizer or salad.  We then had to pay a lot of extra money for the gratuity and tax.  I had purchased the groupons for ourselves and friends and felt embarrassed by what a poor value it was.
Name: Inga N.

Description: Great location, great deal, personable staff... Love this place!
Name: Eric P.

Description: Pretty cozy and the staff was nice
Name: Trecia T.

Description: great staff! have had brunch and dinner here...would say the dinner deal is better but overall great place!
Name: Cait D.

Description:
Small local place with decent wine bar and small but incredibly good menu.
Date potential location, that makes you feel at ease, but with great service.
Name: John L.

Description: Cozy upper east side wine bar. Attentive staff and great food. My friend and I will definitely go back!
Name: Jenn

Description:
Great restaurant, great service, great food, and most of all...great value!
I highly recommend the wine bar for a date night or night out on the town!
Name: Elizabeth R.

Description: The skirt steak, chicken milanese and the tiramisu were on point with perfection. The white wines went well with the appetizer plate and the red wines were divine with the food we ordered. I highly recommend 1742 Wine Bar.
Name: Lisa M.

Description: 1742 Wine bar was quaint and nice.  Service was average (some folks better than others), but welcoming.  Food was not complicated, but delicious.   The wine tasting was scattered nicely throughout dinner and we never felt without wine.
Name: Kelly S.

Description: EXELLENT!!  I would defintely go back here again, and I have already recommended 1742 Wine Bar to many of my friends!
Name: LYNN C.

Description: I will recommend 1742 wine bar to my friends and family and will definitely go back again :)
I love the 1742 Wine Bar!!!
Name: Solangel B.

Description: The wine tasting and dinner were delicious; it would have been nice if it included a small dessert. I definitely recommend 1742 Wine Bar to friends visiting NYC.
Name: Eva I.

Description: LOVE and Staff is really nice.
Name: Kaydia R.

Description: The gentleman at the bar was very nice! He was on top of everything and never let our wine get low.  The skirt steak was great and my husband said that his shrimp pasta was one of the best he has had in awhile!
Name: Katherine M.

Description: Skirt steak over spinach was awesome!
Name: Christianna A.

Description: The skirt steak was delicious
Name: Richard R.

Description: When we got there and sited the place was loud.  The antipasto was OK, the main courses were very good.  I had the Tilapia and my wife had the Skirt Steak and both were great. Service was excellent and the 6 glasses of wine to taste were also good.  I would be back!!
Name: Tony P.

Description: The skirt steak is phenomenal!
Name: Rob D.

Description: Skirt Steak was delicious
Name: James D.

Description: Went on a small date with my husband , we loved it! Romantic relax spot but not mellow , we ordered the Skirt steak and Gnocchi which were amazingly good and the Irish coffee and whiskey and the Tiramisu amazingggg give this place a 9 only because when walking in felt a little awkward not knowing if coming in thru the right door since they had this long curtain
Name: Awilda R.

Description: Nice variety in the wine tasting.  The skirt steak was delicious.  Intimate and charming.
Name: Eileen L.

Description: Was a little skeptical after reading the mixed reviews but very glad we went anyway. The waitress was extremely friendly and accommodating. The skirt steak and gnocchi were amazing as well! We will definitely return.
Name: Danielle H.

Description: I brought my boyfriend here for our anniversary and we both absolutely loved it! The waitress was nice and I loved that she gave a little history on each wine we tasted. The appetizers really bring out the flavors of each wine. My boyfriend had the skirt steak (delicious! definitely recommend) and I had the pasta asparagus alfredo, amazing! We are definitely coming back here again!! Definitely worth it, we had a great experience here.
Name: Franchesca G.

Description: The skirt steak over spinach is great as well as the shrimp pasta.
Name: Shannon

Description: Pleasant evening.  Friendly service.  The skirt steak entree was very tasty.  All in all a fun experience and I would recommend.
Name: Eileen

Description: So comfy, relaxing and pleasant staff. ..I'm drunk
Name: Marybell M.

Description: The place is magical and romantic and the staff are amazing ,We will definitely  going back.
Name: Jean-claudy T.

Description: The staff was pleasant and well versed on wines.
Name: Desir N.

Description: Glad we came here! Nice spot with amazing staff and food!!
Name: Esther M.

Description: Nice place.  Nice staff.  Fun wine tasting/dinner.  Only complaint is it's a little warm.
Name: Sidonie J.

Description: Very cozy place and staff super attentive. Don't assume you need to consume the bottle of wine right there. You can take it home. The wine tasting is enough for the night with the dinner.
Name: Ruth D.

Description: It's small..make reservation and get there early.  The staff are very attentive to customers---even when using groupon.
Name: Marie D.

Description: You get to taste 6 wines but then when I asked for the bottle at the end of what I tasted, they didn't have it. So why gives us that particular one to taste? The steak was tough. I wasn't impressed. Unfortunately Wont be back

Description: The wine tasting was great - nice portions on the 6 wines we tasted.  the food was - eh..  not so good.  Our waitress Melissa was super nice and made the evening fun.

Description: Good customer service and definitely worth the money. Plan on taking public transportation if you plan on drinking all 6 glasses of wine. The steak and spinach was also great but they didn't have any steak sauce. But was still good without it.

Description: Bad experience. Groupon was for six wine tastings, three whites and three reds. We were only served two whites and three reds, ripped  us off out of two. Worst part was $18 gratuity included on the bill, which is ridiculous.

Description: Value of the Groupon was listed at $179. 00. Tasted 3 white wines and 3 red wines. Pours were small. Wines were not exceptional. Food was adequate. Took home your choice of wine. One bottle. Dinner was not worth $179. Groupon for $49 was good.
Name: Mary A.

Description: The cheese plate isn't great but the wine samplers are good and so are the entres.
Name: Allison G.

Description: Food decent - but no choice of appetizer - just had a small cheese plate - not that great - entree was better - if dessert choice was included with voucher it would have been a better experience - but, bringing home a bottle of wine was nice !

Description: The 1742 Wine Bar is a perfect place to bring a date, cozy, high scale employees I can recommend with two thumbs up!
Name: Sandro G.

Description: Great customer service. Our server gave us each an antipasto plate and and extra glass of wine. We are looking forward to our next date night out and plan to bring friends!
Name: Nicole V.

Description: Cute little place.  Food was very good.  Waitstaff attentive and friendly.  I'd go back.
Name: Margaret F.

Description: Great place, service, environment, food and drinks, I recommend it, I definitely will go back
Name: Hugo L.

Description: The food is terrific, really exceptional. We had the skirt steak with spinach, and the penne with sausage, both really delicious. Also, our waitress was extremely knowledgable and gave us great information about all of the wines. Great experience!!!
